name: DEATH TRIALS (updated v.1.3)
description:
We LOVE horror. And we will give you as much as you need if you let us! Our company website is https://madeinamericamedia.com

This was created for the HALLOWEEN GAME JAM by Official Horror Video Games. Join them for FREE game promotion: https://itch.io/jam/halloween-game-jam-by-official-horror-video-games

.

HOW TO PLAY:

(Make sure to apply cool filters in SETTINGS.)

W,A,S,D to move.

CTRL to crouch.

SHIFT to run.

SPACE to jump.

E to interact.

TAB for inventory.

RIGHT MOUSE button to zoom.

Numbers 1-3 for items. Automatically shortcuts items unless you change them.
